application_type_full: Outline planning permission: Some matters reserved
description: Redevelopment to provide retail shops and market hall of 5893sq.m. with 4552sq.m. associated retail storage areas 796sq.m. office space and 335 car parking spaces at ground and basement levels.
decision_conditions: In order that the Authority may be satisfied with the details of the proposal as provided for in Article 7 of the Town and Country Planning General Development Order 1988.
